caption.center: LOUIS EDWARD MINCE, Appellant, v. CUPP, Respondent.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Marion County, VAL D. SLOPER, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Ken C. Hadley, Deputy Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the brief was Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem.
John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief were Lee Johnson, Attorney General, and Jim G. Russell, Assistant Attorney General, Salem.
opinion.panel: Before SCHWAB, Chief Judge, and FOLEY and THORNTON, Judges.Page 66
